input.sentences: we still had a few hours left before we had to leave .
we went to a local beach to collect shells .
we found a giant beached buoy and climbed on top of it .
there was a small house that was used for sheep that we took photos of .
on our way back we took one last picture for memories .
output.sentences: We left work early to take a walk.
We collected seashells on the sea shore.
My friend climbed to the top of a bouy.
We took a lot of memorable pictures.
I will always remember this day.
